message.text:
```❯ ghc Tree.hs
[1 of 2] Compiling Main             ( Tree.hs, Tree.o )
Tree.hs:8:1: error: [GHC-87110]
    Could not find module ‘System.Random’.
    Use -v to see a list of the files searched for.
  |
8 | import System.Random
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Tree.hs:9:1: error: [GHC-87110]
    Could not find module ‘System.Random.Shuffle’.
    Use -v to see a list of the files searched for.
  |
9 | import System.Random.Shuffle (shuffleM)
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^```

  How can i install them ?

parts.text:
```❯ ghc Tree.hs
[1 of 2] Compiling Main             ( Tree.hs, Tree.o )
Tree.hs:8:1: error: [GHC-87110]
    Could not find module ‘System.Random’.
    Use -v to see a list of the files searched for.
  |
8 | import System.Random
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Tree.hs:9:1: error: [GHC-87110]
    Could not find module ‘System.Random.Shuffle’.
    Use -v to see a list of the files searched for.
  |
9 | import System.Random.Shuffle (shuffleM)
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^```

  How can i install them ?

content.value: Refining question to improve search accuracy.

response.value:
To install the missing Haskell modules (`System.Random` and `System.Random.Shuffle`), you need to install the corresponding packages using the terminal.

1. Open your terminal in your project directory.
2. Run the following commands to install the packages:


```sh
cabal update
cabal install random random-shuffle
```
If you are using Stack, use:


```sh
stack install random random-shuffle
```
After installing, try compiling your file again.

If you want to manage dependencies in a `.cabal` file, add these lines under `build-depends`:

```
random,
random-shuffle
```

You can also use the integrated terminal in VS Code.

To open the integrated terminal in VS Code, use the **Terminal: Create New Terminal** command.

codeBlocks.code:
cabal update
cabal install random random-shuffle
